name: Widow's Mercy
description: A dangerous black resin created through alchemical distillation of nightshade and venom. A small amount placed under the tongue provides instant, complete pain suppression. Used by field surgeons for emergency amputations and by desperate warriors who refuse to fall.

substance.effect: Reduces pain by 10 for 1 hour. Gain +3 resolve when consumed.

name: Crimson Tears
description: A blood-red liquid extracted from rare deep-earth fungus. Applied as eye drops, it causes the user to weep crimson tears while completely masking all physical trauma. The effect is unsettling to witness but undeniably effective.
side_effect: User's tears run red for the duration, which can be socially problematic.

name: Dreamless Draught
description: An alchemical preparation that creates a dissociative state where pain feels distant and unimportant. Mixed with water or ale before consumption. The user remains functional but feels detached from their injuries.

name: Bloodthorn Resin
description: Processed bloodthorn extract formed into small capsules. Swallowed whole, it provides powerful pain suppression as it dissolves. Popular among mercenaries and adventurers for its reliability and portability. Doses stack.

substance.effect: Reduces pain by 2 for 24 hours. Multiple doses stack.
